q: why does the old man in blue knock on the toy
pred: The old man in blue is knocking on the toy plane to get the attention of the woman holding the kite. He is trying to get her to release the kite so that he can fly it. The woman is holding the kite and appears to be hesitant to let go. The old man is persistent in his efforts, and eventually, the woman releases the kite, allowing him to fly it.
